data.text: @como_belladonna For a moment when I only looked at the photo I was thinking you were pregnant.  Then I read it.
@como_belladonna You’re so welcome! And thanks for the recommendation - I’ve been meaning to get mine done. I’ll check them out!
@laurjahnig thank you, your well wishes make me smile almost as much as your compliments on my nails <3 Daisy Nails on S Robert St!!!!! Lien is my nail tech!!!!!
@como_belladonna I hope you have a speedy recovery! (also your nails are amazing)

@jasoncomix if it helps to hear, snapping an acrylic (even when the real nail is underneath like mine) is instant and relatively painless!!!!!!!! it is way better than breaking a real nail, or getting a hangnail or something. if you've never had acrylics i would suggest trying them fr
@como_belladonna I appreciate you sharing your pain, and I hope your replacement goes well! I just have a... thing... about broken fingernails. It's my weakness.

@jasoncomix I AM SO SORRY I HAD TO SHARE MY PAIN, i will now not go into detail about how my nail tech has to take off the fake one to replace it, you would probably faint lol. not putting that horrible energy on the timeline for you internet friend <3
@como_belladonna I cannot even look at that without cringing! 😭
@jasoncomix seriously, i cannot believe this happened. but maybe a sign from the universe that i should be using my work from home time to pick up my bass again lmao. strummin' thumb is READY
